text: Veronica Maya (born Veronica Maya Russo in Paris, 14 July 1977) is an Italian actress. She performs mostly on television. She acted also in movies.VERONICA MAYA TORNA ALLO ZECCHINO… DI NATALE == Film == * Italian Business, dir. Mario Chiavalin (2017) * Passpartù - Operazione Doppiozero, dir. Lucio Bastolla (2019) * Magari resto, dir. Mario Parruccini (2020) * Ed è subito commedia, dir. Brando Improta (2023)ED È SUBITO COMMEDIA == References == == Other websites == * Veronica Maya inCineDataBase Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Veronica Maya
